content: *this tapestry/pillow is made using overlay mosaic crochet technique it contains a digital chart **full written instructions** mosaic crochet explanation advice on how to read the chart photos written pattern for the tapestry written pattern for the pillow back panels and assembly instructions * *the actual digital chart is 75 stitches by 75 row = pillow size 40 x 40cm and tapestry size 33 x 33cm * *each chart can be used to make the pillow wall hanging a bag anything you like…your creativity has no boundaries and i would love to see what you make * *you will need three colours to make this pattern black white and colour of your choice for the background i have used dk / 8 ply yarn * *this pattern has been designed by me sarka baran - sharka s magic crochet and is protected by international copyright law please do not copy share display or redistribute this pattern without the owner s permission this includes sharing photos of parts of the charts with others * *you are more than welcome to sell your finished items using this pattern/charts but i would appreciate if you could give me credit for the pattern if possible if you would like to contact me you can message me through ravelry or facebook *
